description: Deletes a volume. You can only delete a volume if it's not attached to a cluster or a dataview. When a volume is deleted, any data on the volume is lost. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment, whose clusters can attach to the volume.

parameters.name: volumeName
parameters.description: The name of the volume that you want to delete.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
